- #45: Use regexps instead of wildcards. However, seems like code must resolve full URL before checking if it should be excluded; currently e.g. `../relative2.html` will be skipped.

- #44: Only two EventEmitters are set up, so this is probably due to requests, and possibly timeouts and redirect loops. Perhaps limit number of requests, but don't know for sure.
